Title: Back to Basics: Rendering Razor Views to String in ASP.NET Core

Title: Timing attacks: Introduction
Description:
Timing attacks extract your confidential data
from observations of the time used by your computer.
Timing attacks have been demonstrated again and again
to successfully extract complete cryptographic keys and other secrets.
